topic.title: Public zeronet server on my LAN
topic.body:
I'm trying to make my zeronet running server available for other machines on my LAN. I'm not sure if what I want to do make sense.

Can any browser open a ZeroNet site without going through a local zeronet process?

1_1GiYSQXB6Qsog3Mu7jL2zFmAm38d4XZDtZ.body:
Amazing

`zeronet.py --ui_ip "*"`

Was what I looking for. The _--ui_password_ option is great.

Thanks for your quick answers
